participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

Levels.0: I am sad once in a while.
Levels.1: I am sad many times.
Levels.2: I am sad all the time.
Nothing will ever work out for me.
Levels.1: I am not sure if things will work out for me.
Levels.0: Things will work out for me O.K.
I do most things O.K.
Levels.1: I do many things wrong.
Levels.2: I do everything wrong.

Levels.0: I have fun in many things.
Levels.1: I have fun in some things.
Levels.2: Nothing is fun at all.

Levels.0: I am important to my family
Levels.1: I am not sure if I am important to my family.
Levels.2: My family is better off without me.
I hate myself.
Levels.1: I do not like myself.
Levels.0: I like myself.

Levels.2: All bad things are my fault.
Levels.1: Many bad things are my fault.
Levels.0: Bad things are not usually my fault.
I do not think about killing myself.
Levels.1: I think about killing myself but would not do it.
Levels.2: I want to kill myself.
I feel like crying every day.
Levels.1: I feel like crying many days.
Levels.0: I feel like crying once in a while.

Levels.2: I feel cranky all the time.
Levels.1: I feel cranky many times.
Levels.0: I am almost never cranky.
I like being with people.
Levels.1: I do not like being with people many times.
Levels.2: I do not want to be with people at all.
I cannot make up my mind about things.
Levels.1: It is hard to make up my mind about things.
Levels.0: I make up my mind about things easily.
I look O.K.
Levels.1: There are some bad things about my looks.
Levels.2: I look ugly.
I have to push myself all the time to do my schoolwork.
Levels.1: I have to push myself many times to do my schoolwork.
Levels.0: Doing schoolwork is not a big problem.

Levels.2: I have trouble sleeping every night.
Levels.1: I have trouble sleeping many nights.
Levels.0: I sleep pretty well.
I am tired once in a while.
Levels.1: I am tired many days.
Levels.2: I am tired all the time.
Most days I do not feel like eating.
Levels.1: Many days I do not feel like eating.
Levels.0: I eat pretty well.
I do not worry about aches and pains.
Levels.1: I worry about aches and pains many times.
Levels.2: I worry about aches and pains all the time.

Levels.0: I do not feel alone.
Levels.1: I feel alone many times.
Levels.2: I feel alone all the time.
I never have fun at school.
Levels.1: I have fun at school only once in a while.
Levels.0: I have fun at school many times.
I have plenty of friends.
Levels.1: I have some friends but I wish I had more.
Levels.2: I do not have any friends.

Levels.0: My schoolwork is alright.
Levels.1: My schoolwork is not as good as before.
Levels.2: I do very badly in subjects I used to be good in.
I can never be as good as other kids.
Levels.1: I can be as good as other kids if I want to.
Levels.0: I am just as good as other kids.

Levels.2: Nobody really loves me.
Levels.1: I am not sure if anybody loves me.
Levels.0: I am sure that somebody loves me.
It is easy for me to get along with friends.
Levels.1: I get into arguments with friends many times.
Levels.2: I get into arguments with friends all the time.
I fall asleep during the day all the time.
Levels.1: I fall asleep during the day many times.
Levels.0: I almost never fall asleep during the day.

Levels.2: Most days I feel like I can't stop eating.
Levels.1: Many days I feel like I can't stop eating.
Levels.0: My eating is O.K.
It is easy for me to remember things
Levels.1: It is a little hard to remember things.
Levels.2: It is very hard to remember things.

CDIN_29.Description: Sum of responses from questions 1, 9, 10, 15, 16, 17, 18, 26, 27. Assesses depression symptoms that manifest as sadness or irritability, as well as physical symptoms related to sleep, appetite, fatigue, and aches/pains. | Calculation = [CDIN_01]+[CDIN_9]+[CDIN_10]+[CDIN_15]+[CDIN_16]+[CDIN_17]+[CDIN_18]+[CDIN_26]+[CDIN_27]

CDIN_30.Description: Sum of responses from questions 2, 6, 7, 8, 13, 24. Assesses low self-esteem, self-dislike, and feelings of being unloved. | Calculation = [CDIN_02]+[CDIN_06]+[CDIN_07]+[CDIN_08]+[CDIN_13]+[CDIN_24]

CDIN_31.Description: Sum of Negative Mood/Physical Symptoms and Negative Self-Esteem Raw Scores. | Calculation = [CDIN_29]+[CDIN_30]

CDIN_32.Description: Sum of responses from questions 3, 4, 12, 14, 20, 22, 23, 28. Assesses the child’s evaluation of his/her abilities and school performance as negative and an impaired capacity to enjoy school and other activities. | Calculation = [CDIN_03]+[CDIN_04]+[CDIN_12]+[CDIN_14]+[CDIN_20]+[CDIN_22]+[CDIN_23]+[CDIN_28]

CDIN_33.Description: Sum of responses from questions 5, 11, 19, 21, 25.  Assesses problems interacting with peers, as well as feelings of being lonely and unimportant to his or her own family. | Calculation = [CDIN_05] + [CDIN_11] + [CDIN_19] + [CDIN_21] + [CDIN_25]

CDIN_34.Description: Sum of Ineffectiveness and Interpersonal Problems Raw Scores. | Calculation = [CDIN_32]+[CDIN_33]

CDIN_35.Description: Sum of Emotional Problems and Functional Problems Raw Scores. | Calculation = [CDIN_31]+[CDIN_34]

CDIN_40.Description:
Interpretive Guidelines for T Scores: (higher scores indicate increased difficulties/problems <40-Low Score (fewer concerns than are typically reported); 40-59 –Average Score (typical number of concerns); 60-64 – High Average Score (somewhat more concerns than are typically reported); 70+ - Very Elevated Score (many more concerns than are typically reported) | Calculation = iif([CDIN_37] == 1, 
    iif( [CDIN_36] >= 7.000, 
        iif( [CDIN_36] <= 12.000, 
            iif( [CDIN_29] >= 12, 90, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 11, 87, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 10, 82, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 9, 78, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 8, 74, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 7, 70, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 6, 66, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 5, 62, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 4, 58, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 3, 54, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 2, 50, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 1, 46, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 0, 42, 0),
        0),
    0) +

    iif( [CDIN_36] >= 13.000, 
        iif( [CDIN_36] <= 17.000, 
            iif( [CDIN_29] >= 11, 90, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 10, 87, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 9, 82, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 8, 78, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 7, 73, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 6, 69, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 5, 64, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 4, 59, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 3, 55, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 2, 50, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 1, 46, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 0, 41, 0),
        0),
    0),
0)

+

iif([CDIN_37] == 2, 
    iif( [CDIN_36] >= 7.000, 
        iif( [CDIN_36] <= 12.000, 
            iif( [CDIN_29] >= 11, 90, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 10, 88, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 9, 83, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 8, 78, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 7, 74, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 6, 69, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 5, 65, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 4, 60, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 3, 55, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 2, 51, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 1, 46, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 0, 42, 0),
        0),
    0) +

    iif( [CDIN_36] >= 13.000, 
        iif( [CDIN_36] <= 17.000, 
            iif( [CDIN_29] >= 16, 90, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 15, 89, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 14, 86, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 13, 83, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 12, 79, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 11, 76, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 10, 73, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 9, 70, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 8, 67, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 7, 63, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 6, 60, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 5, 57, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 4, 54, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 3, 51, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 2, 48, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 1, 44, 0) + 
            iif( [CDIN_29] == 0, 41, 0),
        0),
    0),
0)
